name: PSP Boggle
description:
Objective:

Compose words of at least three letters . The letters to form a word must be contiguous , that is, they must go side by side and it does not matter if it is up, down, left, right or diagonally. If the created word exists in the database (there are about 90,000) it will appear in the list. The score depends on the number of letters you manage to do it with.
 

Controls:

Digital pad to move the cursor.
X to select letter.
Circle to check the compound word.
Start to pause the game and access the menu.
